languages.text: {n}Человек в сером тарабанит пальцами по инфопластине. Его массивный головной {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}имплант{/g} щедро рассыпает искры на все вокруг.{/n} "Двести миллионов… Нет! Коррозия не учтена... Но где?.."

traits.locale_text: {n}Человек в сером тарабанит пальцами по инфопланшету. Его массивный головной {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}имплант{/g} щедро рассыпает искры на все вокруг.{/n} "Двести миллионов… Нет! Коррозия не учтена... Но где?.."

languages.text: {n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"
languages.original_text: {n}Человек в сером тарабанит пальцами по инфопластине. Его массивный головной {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}имплант{/g} щедро рассыпает искры на все вокруг.{/n} "Двести миллионов… Нет! Коррозия не учтена... Но где?.."

traits.locale_text: {n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head implant showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Corrosion wasn't accounted for... But where?"

{n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"

{n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"

languages.text: {n}El hombre de ropaje gris toquetea su tablilla de datos. El voluminoso {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implante{/g} de su cabeza riega con chispas constantes sus alrededores.{/n} «Doscientos millones... ¡No! No he tenido en cuenta la corrosión... pero ¿dónde?».
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"

{n}El hombre de ropaje gris toquetea su tablilla de datos. El voluminoso implante de su cabeza riega con chispas constantes sus alrededores.{/n} «Doscientos millones... ¡No! No he tenido en cuenta la corrosión... pero ¿dónde?».

languages.text: {n}眼前这个身穿灰衣的男人正用手指轻敲着数据板，笨重的头部{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}植入物{/g}发出噼里啪啦的声音，火花四溅。{/n}“两亿……不对！腐蚀的部分还没计算进去……但具体是哪部分？”
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前这个身穿灰衣的男人正用手指轻敲着数据板，笨重的头部植入物发出噼里啪啦的声音，火花四溅。{/n}“两亿……不对！腐蚀的部分还没计算进去……但具体是哪部分？”
{n}眼前这个身穿灰衣的男人正用手指轻敲着数据板，笨重的头部植入物发出噼里啪啦的声音，火花四溅。{/n}“两亿……不对！腐蚀的部分还没计算进去……但具体是哪部分？”

languages.text: {n}灰色に包まれた男がデータスレートを指でタップする。大きな頭の{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}インプラント{/g}は周囲に大量の火花を降り注ぐ。{/n}「2億…いや！腐敗は数えなかった…が、どこだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"

traits.locale_text: {n}灰色に包まれた男がデータスレートを指でタップする。大きな頭のインプラントは周囲に大量の火花を降り注ぐ。{/n}「2億…いや！腐敗は数えなかった…が、どこだ？」
{n}灰色に包まれた男がデータスレートを指でタップする。大きな頭のインプラントは周囲に大量の火花を降り注ぐ。{/n}「2億…いや！腐敗は数えなかった…が、どこだ？」

languages.text: {n}L'homme vêtu de gris tapote sa plaque de données du bout des doigts. De son volumineux {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} crânien surgissent de vastes gerbes d'étincelles.{/n} « Deux cents millions... Non ! C'est compter sans la corrosion. Mais où... ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"

{n}L'homme vêtu de gris tapote sa plaque de données du bout des doigts. De son volumineux implant crânien surgissent de vastes gerbes d'étincelles.{/n} « Deux cents millions... Non ! C'est compter sans la corrosion. Mais où... ? »

languages.text: {n}Gri kıyafetli adam, databelasında parmaklarını gezdiriyor. Hantal kafa {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implantı{/g}, etrafa bolca kıvılcım saçıyor.{/n} "İki yüz milyon... Hayır! Aşınmayı hesaba katmadım... Peki nerede?"
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-clad man taps his fingers on his data-slate. His bulky head {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}implant{/g} showers the surroundings liberally with sparks.{/n} "Two hundred million... No! Didn't account for corrosion... But where?"

{n}Gri kıyafetli adam, databelasında parmaklarını gezdiriyor. Hantal kafa implantı, etrafa bolca kıvılcım saçıyor.{/n} "İki yüz milyon... Hayır! Aşınmayı hesaba katmadım... Peki nerede?"

languages.text: {n}Der grau gekleidete Mann tippt mit den Fingern auf seinen Datablock. Sein voluminöses {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}Kopfimplantat{/g} sprüht Funken.{/n} "Zweihundert Millionen ... Nein! Nein, Korrosion habe ich nicht berücksichtigt ... Aber wo?"
